messageClouds.message:
Congratulations!
Your hard work will help you lift up in the world! You just traveled 12 feet.
Yikes! You're late on 12 assignments! Better get cracking.

You completed your
first assignment.

with the checkmark.

Congratulations!
You've conquered a New Skill! Review all your skills for this class in the Skills Acquired tab. Once you finish this assignment, you'll be able to go back to review this skill and keep your skills sharp.

Congratulations!
Flocks form when you get several large winged flying pigs in a row. See how many you can release into the wild.
